description: Describes a rule for the specified Amazon Connect instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the rule.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the rule.

nested_items.name: RuleId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the rule.

nested_items.name: RuleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rule.

nested_items.name: TriggerEventSource
nested_items.description: The event source to trigger the rule.

nested_items.name: EventSourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the event source.

nested_items.name: IntegrationAssociationId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the integration association.

nested_items.name: Function
nested_items.description: The conditions of the rule.

nested_items.name: Actions
nested_items.description: A list of actions to be run when the rule is triggered.

nested_items.name: ActionType
nested_items.description: The type of action that creates a rule.

nested_items.name: TaskAction
nested_items.description: Information about the task action. This field is required if TriggerEventSource is one of the following values: OnZendeskTicketCreate | OnZendeskTicketStatusUpdate | OnSalesforceCaseCreate.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name. Supports variable injection. For more information, see JSONPath reference in the Amazon Connect Administrators Guide.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description. Supports variable injection. For more information, see JSONPath reference in the Amazon Connect Administrators Guide.

nested_items.name: ContactFlowId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the flow.

nested_items.name: References
nested_items.description: Information about the reference when the referenceType is URL. Otherwise, null. (Supports variable injection in the Value field.)

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A valid value for the reference. For example, for a URL reference, a formatted URL that is displayed to an agent in the Contact Control Panel (CCP).

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the reference. DATE must be of type Epoch timestamp.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the attachment reference type.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the reference.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: Relevant details why the reference was not successfully created.

nested_items.name: EventBridgeAction
nested_items.description: Information about the EventBridge action.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name.

nested_items.name: AssignContactCategoryAction
nested_items.description: Information about the contact category action.

nested_items.name: SendNotificationAction
nested_items.description: Information about the send notification action.

nested_items.name: DeliveryMethod
nested_items.description: Notification delivery method.

nested_items.name: Subject
nested_items.description: The subject of the email if the delivery method is EMAIL. Supports variable injection. For more information, see JSONPath reference in the Amazon Connect Administrators Guide.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: Notification content. Supports variable injection. For more information, see JSONPath reference in the Amazon Connect Administrators Guide.

nested_items.name: ContentType
nested_items.description: Content type format.

nested_items.name: Recipient
nested_items.description: Notification recipient.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: UserIds
nested_items.description: A list of user IDs. Supports variable injection of $.ContactLens.ContactEvaluation.Agent.AgentId for OnContactEvaluationSubmit event source.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CreateCaseAction
nested_items.description: Information about the create case action.

nested_items.name: Fields
nested_items.description: An array of objects with Field ID and Value data.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: Unique identifier of a field.

nested_items.name: BooleanValue
nested_items.description: A Boolean number value type.

nested_items.name: DoubleValue
nested_items.description: A Double number value type.

nested_items.name: EmptyValue
nested_items.description: An empty value.

nested_items.name: StringValue
nested_items.description: String value type.

nested_items.name: TemplateId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier of a template.

nested_items.name: UpdateCaseAction
nested_items.description: Information about the update case action.

nested_items.name: Fields
nested_items.description: An array of objects with Field ID and Value data.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: Unique identifier of a field.

nested_items.name: BooleanValue
nested_items.description: A Boolean number value type.

nested_items.name: DoubleValue
nested_items.description: A Double number value type.

nested_items.name: EmptyValue
nested_items.description: An empty value.

nested_items.name: StringValue
nested_items.description: String value type.

nested_items.name: AssignSlaAction
nested_items.description: Information about the assign SLA action.

nested_items.name: SlaAssignmentType
nested_items.description: Type of SLA assignment.

nested_items.name: CaseSlaConfiguration
nested_items.description: The SLA configuration for Case SLA Assignment.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of an SLA.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Type of SLA for Case SlaAssignmentType.

nested_items.name: FieldId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier of a Case field.

nested_items.name: TargetFieldValues
nested_items.description: Represents a list of target field values for the fieldId specified in CaseSlaConfiguration. The SLA is considered met if any one of these target field values matches the actual field value.

nested_items.name: BooleanValue
nested_items.description: A Boolean number value type.

nested_items.name: DoubleValue
nested_items.description: A Double number value type.

nested_items.name: EmptyValue
nested_items.description: An empty value.

nested_items.name: StringValue
nested_items.description: String value type.

nested_items.name: TargetSlaMinutes
nested_items.description: Target duration in minutes within which an SLA should be completed.

nested_items.name: EndAssociatedTasksAction
nested_items.description: Information about the end associated tasks action.

nested_items.name: SubmitAutoEvaluationAction
nested_items.description: Information about the submit automated evaluation action.

nested_items.name: EvaluationFormId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the auto-evaluation enabled form.

nested_items.name: PublishStatus
nested_items.description: The publish status of the rule.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the rule was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for the when the rule was last updated.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who last updated the rule.
(string) ---
(string) ---
